short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock the joy of your web research. Save bookmarks to your personal library. Assist browsing with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Perfect for students, professionals, and curious minds.

Key features:

- Free and open-source. 100% local with no user tracking.
- Integrates your browser with all leading AI assistants (ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, 10+ more).
- Supports generic articles, YouTube transcripts, X posts, Gmail emails, ChatGPT conversations and many more content types.
- You can sign up (optional) and build personal library of links with 1000 free bookmarks.
- Private bookmarks are encrypted End-to-End with AES-CBC 256-bit, encryption key is derived with Argon2id, follows Bitwardenâ„¢ implementation.
- Share selected bookmarks to your public profile and connect with like-minded people.

Add Taaabs to your browser and unlock the joy of your web research!

Star on Github https://github.com/taaabs/taaabs

Q&A

Does Taaabs Web Clipper collect any data?
One of the main reasons for creating Taaabs is privacy. When using AI assistants, pages are parsed 100% locally and sent directly to supported assistants like ChatGPT using browser built-in communication channels. When you sign in to the service and start building your personal library of bookmarks, all data is secured through the use of end-to-end encryption locally your browser, no data ever leaves your computer unencrypted. We cannot know what you saved until you explicitly publish something to your public profile.

Is it free?
Thanks to local page parsing and using browser built-in communication channels, using AI features is totally free. Your usage limits is a subject to the plan you have with a selected assistant. You can save up to 1000 bookmarks to your personal library for free. To save more, you'll need to upgrade.
